value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We have come for you, Surtr!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hah-hah-hah! The stray pups have
wandered my way at last.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Surtr, king of Múspell... You invaded
Nifl and Askr and stole the lives of
innocents.$k$pAs prince of the Askran Kingdom and
as a member of the Order of
Heroes...$k$pHere and now, I will strike you down!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, well! Come and challenge me,
for there can be only one king. I will
sear that lesson into your tender skin!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You are no king! A ruler with no
concern for his people is no ruler
at all.$k$pYou are but a tyrant. And there is
nothing left for you.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hah-hah-hah! You're an amusing
child, I will grant you that.$k$p$EFace_Cool|A king is a tyrant. My whim is law!
All live at my pleasure, and exercising
my pleasure is what makes me a king!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|But by that standard, you are no king.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You will no longer be able to rule by
whim, as you claim is your right.$k$pWe will put an end to your rule. We
will put an end to your life.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|HAH-HAH-HAH! Well spoken, child
of ice!$k$pThe dark flame of vengeance has
burned away your weakness!$k$pThis...is what I like to see! Through
torment, I have transformed your ice
to flame!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What nonsense!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|There is nothing left to say. The
flames inside me rage, ready to
erupt...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Let us fight—to the death!
Hah-hah-hah!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_MAP_BRAVE_04,0|$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Geh...ehh...ehh...$k$pImpossible...$k$pIt was my will...that you would die.
And yet... How...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|How? I will tell you, Surtr. You are
weak.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You dare? You are not my equals!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You have taken what is important to
us. You have taken so much more
than you could ever answer for...$k$pAnd now, we will take everything
from you. Every last bit.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Graaaagh!$k$p$Sbs6000|Ehh...grrrh...$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Mother... Sister... Finally. Finally, it
is done.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. It is truly finished this time.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We have carried out our duty at
long last.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|We must let everyone know!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. Let us head home. Back to
Askr...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Brother... I am grateful for your aid.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|What next for you, my sister?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fjorm...please don't say that you're
leaving...$k$pI want to cry... We finally found each
other! We can live together in Nifl
again...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Ylgr. I'm sorry...$k$pThere's a debt that I owe but can't
possibly repay...$k$pA debt to $Nu
and the Order of Heroes.$k$pI know it's selfish of me to leave... But
I want to repay the Order for all
they've done...$k$pHríd, I leave Nifl in your hands.$k$pI know you will make a great king.
And someday, you will forge a peace
with Laevatein's Múspell...$k$p$EFace_Pain|*COUGH*$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|Have you told them, Fjorm? That you
are a sacrifice to the Rite of Frost?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|Like the Rite of Flame, the Rite of
Frost comes at the cost of life...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Mother and Gunnthrá both... They
sacrificed themselves to save us.$k$pIt is thanks to Gunnthrá that I still
live, most likely.$k$pAnd now that it is my turn... Nothing
would make me happier than to aid
$Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|Sister...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I don't know how much longer I will
live. And so I will treasure each
moment I have left.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|It is not long, I fear. It pains me to say
this.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Hríd. I know that...$k$pIt is strange. I had always been so
resolute. Knowing Surtr had been
destroyed, I could die in peace.$k$pBut my experiences with the Order
shook me to my very core...$k$pEven if it's for just a little bit longer...
I want to stay with them. Oh,
$Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NormalNEW,Face|I understand your feelings, Sister. By
all means, go. I will pray for your
safety.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Hríd.$k$pIt is time to go. I must head to Askr—
at $Nu's side.$k$p$Fo1000,255,255,255,255|$Sbs150|
